00184 #define LOCK_CONFIG() do { \
00185         debug(LOG_DEBUG, "Locking config"); \
00186         pthread_mutex_lock(&config_mutex); \
00187         debug(LOG_DEBUG, "Config locked"); \
00188 } while (0)
00189 
00190 #define UNLOCK_CONFIG() do { \
00191         debug(LOG_DEBUG, "Unlocking config"); \
00192         pthread_mutex_unlock(&config_mutex); \
00193         debug(LOG_DEBUG, "Config unlocked"); \
00194 } while (0)
